Title: A Drink with Kalecgos
Description:
<Kalecgos is quiet for a moment, a wistful look on his face.>

I'd call upon Nozdormu to help us pass the time, but he'd tell me that I should be able to handle this.

So... the Drunken Hozen. If Kiry recommends it, then let us go!
ObjectivesText: Have a drink with Kalecgos in The Drunken Hozen.

Objectives.Text: Drink with Kalecgos in The Drunken Hozen
